item.title: Dancer -- Raiding Primer
item.description: by Io Whitespirit (Faerie) FOREWORD One of the biggest requests I have had is a more concise document on what people “need to know” before jumping into more difficult content. This is not meant to be a replacement for a general guide to Dancer; please see Ringabel’s extensive write-up instead, which will be linked at the end of the document in the appendix. This guide will be broken down into three sections: Basics, Intermediate, and Advanced.
